__e: I swear by God the Almighty and Omniscient that I will speak the pure truth and withhold and add nothing.
On the Day of Judgment... when you stand before the Almighty God... and He asks you...
By the Lord almighty and the word of his forgiveness.
I swear by almighty God that the evidence that I shall give shall be the truth, the whole truth and nothing but the truth.
